Title: Honeywell spin-off expected October 30
Summary: USA: Honeywell’s planned spin-off of its Solstice Advanced Materials business is expected to be completed on October 30, according to latest news from the company.

Title: Fujitsu General to trade as General Inc
Summary: JAPAN: Following its purchase by Paloma Rheem Holdings, the name of the Fujitsu General air conditioning business will change to General Inc from January 1.

Title: Carrier rebrands BluEdge service platform
Summary: USA: Carrier has named its BluEdge global service centres as Carrier Customer Command Centres.

Title: Desiccant AC joins Amazon’s development scheme
Summary: USA: Florida-based Blue Frontier, a developer of air conditioners using liquid desiccant technology, has joined Amazon’s Sustainability Accelerator programme to accelerate the development of climate breakthrough technologies.

Title: Wolseley to stock Haier renewable products
Summary: UK: The Wolseley Group’s Plumb Centre branches are now a source for Haier’s range of renewable products, including air-source heat pumps, smart controls, and battery storage systems.

Title: MHI heat pump can supply hot water at 90℃
Summary: JAPAN: Mitsubishi Heavy Industries has developed a centrifugal heat pump for the Japanese market, which effectively uses waste heat to supply hot water at 90℃.

Title: Clivet updates Zephir4 air renewal series
Summary: ITALY: Clivet’s new generation of Zephir4 air renewal and purification units come with air flow rates from 2,300 to 19,000m³/h, full inverter technology and R32 refrigerant.
